entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Fuzzlyn: Assertion failed 'interval->physReg == srcRegNum || (srcRegNum == REG_STK && interval->physReg == REG_NA)' during 'LSRA allocate' #107841
    9.0.0
  • GetAlternateLookup<ReadOnlySpan<char>>() does not work on FrozenSet<string> in .NET 9 RC 1 #107840
    9.0.0
  • TensorPrimitives.Exp<double> returns negative infinity instead of 0 for doubles between approximately -709.5 and -709.7 #107838
    9.0.0
  • .netframework4.7.2 Problem with webrequest asynchronous request #107835

Closed

  • Wrong DateTimeFormat.LongTimePattern in .NET 8 when running in Linux containers #107842
  • GetGenericParameterConstraints() method changes on Net8 #107832
  • Large memory test fails on outerloop #24139
  • Báo cáo SECURITY.md #107837

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Fix a possible infinite wait for GC completion at process shutdown. #107844
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Implement volatile barrier APIs #107843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Implement ProcessStartInfo.InheritHandles for Windows #107836
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 128.0.6613.137, windows: 129.0.6668.42 #107833
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

Merged

  • [wasm] Process LinkerArg for wasm targets #107194
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, os-browser

Updated

  • Switch a couple properties to new VMR properties #107805
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Implement.AddSaturate/SubtractSaturate #107193
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Expand "return condition" into "return condition ? true : false" #107499
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Target .NET 10 / net10.0 #106599
    area-Infrastructure
  • Use live apphost when publishing ilc as singlefile #105004
    os-freebsd, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • fix OS detection for test scripts #107796
    area-Build-mono, 10.0.0
  • Delete `GT_CNS_LNG` #85951
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Extend jump tables #107831
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
